ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: I would find it hard to talk to someone who has a mental illness.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: I would be less likely to become romantically involved with someone if I knew they were mentally ill.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: It is best to avoid people who have mental illness.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: I would feel unsafe being around someone who is mentally ill.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: I would be just as happy to invite a person with mental illness into my home as I would anyone else.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: I would feel relaxed if I had to talk to someone who was mentally ill.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: I am not scared of people with mental illness.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: In general, it is easy to interact with someone who has mental illness.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: People who are mentally ill are avoiding the difficulties of everyday life.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: People with mental illness should support themselves and not expect handouts.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: People who develop mental illness are genetically inferior to other people.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: People with mental illness do not deserve our sympathy.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: We, as a society, should be spending much more money on helping people with mental illness.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: People who become mentally ill are not failures in life.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: We need to support and care for people who become mentally ill.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: Under certain circumstances, anyone can experience mental illness.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: People who are mentally ill need to be controlled by any means necessary.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: Those who have serious mental illness should not be allowed to have children.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: People who are mentally ill should be forced to have treatment.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: People who are mentally ill should be free to make their own decisions (reverse scored).
Notes: 9 = Very strongly disagree; 8 = Strongly disagree; 7 = Disagree; 6 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 3 = Agree; 2 = Strongly Agree; 1 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: People who are mentally ill should be allowed to live their life any way they want (reverse scored).
Notes: 9 = Very strongly disagree; 8 = Strongly disagree; 7 = Disagree; 6 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 3 = Agree; 2 = Strongly Agree; 1 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: Society does not have a right to limit the freedom of people with mental illness (reverse scored).
Notes: 9 = Very strongly disagree; 8 = Strongly disagree; 7 = Disagree; 6 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 3 = Agree; 2 = Strongly Agree; 1 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: The behavior of people with mental illness is unpredictable.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: People with mental illness often do unexpected things.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: In general, you cannot predict how people with mental illness will behave.
Notes: 1 = Very strongly disagree; 2 = Strongly disagree; 3 = Disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 6 = Somewhat agree; 7 = Agree; 8 = Strongly Agree; 9 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: The behavior of people with mental illness is just as predictable as that of people who are mentally healthy (reverse scored).
Notes: 9 = Very strongly disagree; 8 = Strongly disagree; 7 = Disagree; 6 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 3 = Agree; 2 = Strongly Agree; 1 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: People with mental illness behave in ways that are foreseeable (reverse scored).
Notes: 9 = Very strongly disagree; 8 = Strongly disagree; 7 = Disagree; 6 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 3 = Agree; 2 = Strongly Agree; 1 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: I usually find people with mental illness to be consistent in their behavior (reverse scored).
Notes: 9 = Very strongly disagree; 8 = Strongly disagree; 7 = Disagree; 6 = Somewhat disagree; 5 = Neither agree or disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 3 = Agree; 2 = Strongly Agree; 1 = Very strongly agree

ElementDescription: Fear/Avoidance Subscale Score
Notes: Mean of items ppmi1-ppmi8

ElementDescription: Malevolence Subscale Score
Notes: Mean of items of ppmi9-ppmi16

ElementDescription: Authoritarianism Subscale Score
Notes: Mean of items of ppmi17-ppmi22

ElementDescription: Unpredictability Subscale Score
Notes: Mean of items of ppmi23-ppmi28
